name: Dawn of Mages
description:
Dawn of Mages is a 3rd Person Shooter PvP Battle Arena. It is set in a fantasy world where mages battle each other using a pre-built combination of spells.

The game consists of 15 minutes matches, up to 10 players (possibility to add bots), on one of the available maps.

The player's build is chosen before the game from a combination of spells, allowing over 100 different builds. Each player has access to all spells from the beginning. There is no auto-aim, so skill plays the most important role in the game.
